reviewText: My 5 year old loves fishing, and he really liked it.
I liked this video . Great footage showing fishermen at work catching really big fish.
great documentary... bad camera work... but a real tangible look at life on a commercial fishing vessel
Awesome movie it made me want to jump on the boat. Its filled with action and gives you goosebumps. Great!!!

Nice monster Swordfish and Makos! Great stuff! Its just like the Perfect Storm crazy! I loved it!

Check it out for yourself!
this is a COMMERCIAL fishing show - it is not fishing for huge fish with rod and reel and there is nothing extreme about it.  there are some good fish pulled in, but no sport to it in the slightest.
